query.commandtext: SELECT WM.MAT_ID, WM.MAT_VER, MD.MAT_DESC, NVL(SUM(WM.S1_LOSS_QTY_1+WM.S2_LOSS_QTY_1+WM.S3_LOSS_QTY_1+WM.S4_LOSS_QTY_1),0) AS LOSS_QTY ,NVL(SUM(WM.S1_END_QTY_1+WM.S2_END_QTY_1+WM.S3_END_QTY_1+WM.S4_END_QTY_1),0) AS END_QTY FROM RSUMWIPMOV WM, MWIPMATDEF MD WHERE WM.FACTORY = MD.FACTORY AND WM.MAT_ID=MD.MAT_ID ??

SELECT WM.OPER, OD.OPER_DESC, NVL(SUM(WM.S1_LOSS_QTY_1+WM.S2_LOSS_QTY_1+WM.S3_LOSS_QTY_1+WM.S4_LOSS_QTY_1),0) AS LOSS_QTY ,NVL(SUM(WM.S1_END_QTY_1+WM.S2_END_QTY_1+WM.S3_END_QTY_1+WM.S4_END_QTY_1),0) AS END_QTY FROM RSUMWIPMOV WM, MWIPOPRDEF OD WHERE WM.FACTORY = OD.FACTORY AND WM.OPER=OD.OPER ??

SELECT LL.LOSS_CODE, TD.DATA_1, LL.LOSS_QTY FROM (SELECT FACTORY, LOSS_CODE, SUM(LOSS_QTY) AS LOSS_QTY FROM RWIPLOTLSM WHERE FACTORY=:FACTORY AND QTY_FLAG='1' AND TRAN_TIME BETWEEN :FROM_TRAN_TIME AND :TO_TRAN_TIME AND HIST_DEL_FLAG=' ' GROUP BY FACTORY, LOSS_CODE) LL LEFT OUTER JOIN MGCMTBLDAT TD ON LL.FACTORY = TD.FACTORY AND LL.LOSS_CODE = TD.KEY_1 AND TD.TABLE_NAME='LOSS_CODE' ORDER BY LL.LOSS_QTY DESC
SELECT LOT_ID, HIST_SEQ, QTY_FLAG, TRAN_TIME, HIST_DEL_FLAG, FACTORY, MAT_ID, FLOW, OPER, RES_ID, SEQ_NUM, LOSS_CODE, LOSS_QTY FROM RWIPLOTLSM ??

SELECT LR.RWK_CODE, NVL(TD.DATA_1,' ') AS RWK_CODE_DESC , LR.RECORD_COUNT FROM (SELECT FACTORY, RWK_CODE, COUNT(*) AS RECORD_COUNT FROM RWIPLOTRWK WHERE FACTORY=:FACTORY AND TRAN_TIME BETWEEN :FROM_TRAN_TIME AND :TO_TRAN_TIME AND HIST_DEL_FLAG=' ' GROUP BY FACTORY, RWK_CODE) LR LEFT OUTER JOIN MGCMTBLDAT TD ON LR.FACTORY = TD.FACTORY AND LR.RWK_CODE = TD.KEY_1 AND TD.TABLE_NAME='RWK_CODE' ORDER BY LR.RECORD_COUNT DESC

SELECT LOT_ID, HIST_SEQ, TRAN_TIME, HIST_DEL_FLAG,FACTORY, MAT_ID, FLOW, OPER, RES_ID, CAUSE_FLOW, CAUSE_OPER, CAUSE_RES_ID, QTY_1, QTY_2, QTY_3, RWK_CODE, RWK_COUNT, RWK_RET_FLOW, RWK_RET_OPER, RWK_END_FLOW, RWK_END_OPER, RWK_RET_CLEAR_FLAG, RWK_USER_ID, RWK_COMMENT, USER_ID_1, USER_TIME_1, USER_COMMENT_1, USER_ID_2, USER_TIME_2, USER_COMMENT_2, USER_ID_3, USER_TIME_3, USER_COMMENT_3 FROM RWIPLOTRWK ??

SELECT LH.HOLD_CODE, NVL(TD.DATA_1,' ') AS HOLD_CODE_DESC , LH.RECORD_COUNT FROM (SELECT FACTORY, HOLD_CODE, COUNT(*) AS RECORD_COUNT FROM RWIPLOTHLD WHERE FACTORY=:FACTORY AND HOLD_TRAN_TIME BETWEEN :FROM_HOLD_TRAN_TIME AND :TO_HOLD_TRAN_TIME AND HIST_DEL_FLAG=' ' GROUP BY FACTORY, HOLD_CODE) LH LEFT OUTER JOIN MGCMTBLDAT TD ON LH.FACTORY = TD.FACTORY AND LH.HOLD_CODE = TD.KEY_1 AND TD.TABLE_NAME='HOLD_CODE' ORDER BY LH.RECORD_COUNT DESC

SELECT LOT_ID, HIST_SEQ, HOLD_TRAN_TIME, RELEASE_TRAN_TIME, HIST_DEL_FLAG, RELEASE_HIST_SEQ, FACTORY, MAT_ID, FLOW, OPER, RES_ID, CAUSE_FLOW, CAUSE_OPER, CAUSE_RES_ID, QTY_1, QTY_2, QTY_3, CMF_1, CMF_2, CMF_3, CMF_4, CMF_5, CMF_6, CMF_7, CMF_8, CMF_9, CMF_10, HOLD_CODE, HOLD_USER_ID, HOLD_COMMENT, RELEASE_CODE, RELEASE_USER_ID, RELEASE_COMMENT, USER_ID_1, USER_TIME_1, USER_COMMENT_1, USER_ID_2, USER_TIME_2, USER_COMMENT_2, USER_ID_3, USER_TIME_3, USER_COMMENT_3 FROM RWIPLOTHLD ??

SELECT LT.MAT_ID AS MATERIAL, LT.MAT_VER, LT.FLOW, LT.OPER, LT.LOT_ID, LT.FAC_IN_TIME AS FACTORY_IN_TIME, LT.OPER_IN_TIME, LTRIM (TO_CHAR (CT.FAC_DURATION, '99990.0000')) as FAC_DURATION, LTRIM (TO_CHAR (CT.OPER_DURATION, '99990.0000')) as OPER_DURATION, LTRIM (TO_CHAR (CT.EXP_CYCLE_TIME, '99990.0000')) as EXP_CYCLE_TIME, DECODE (CT.EXP_CYCLE_TIME, 0, '0', LTRIM (TO_CHAR (CT.FAC_DURATION / CT.EXP_CYCLE_TIME, '990.0000' ) ) ) AS RATE, SUBSTR(LT.SCH_DUE_TIME, 1, 8) AS SCH_DUE_TIME FROM (SELECT LOT_ID, FACTORY, MAT_ID, MAT_VER, (SYSDATE - TO_DATE (FAC_IN_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ) * 24 AS FAC_DURATION, (SYSDATE - TO_DATE (OPER_IN_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ) * 24 AS OPER_DURATION, ( TO_DATE (SCH_DUE_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') - TO_DATE (FAC_IN_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ) * 24 AS EXP_CYCLE_TIME, (SYSDATE - TO_DATE (FAC_IN_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ) / ( TO_DATE (SCH_DUE_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') - TO_DATE (FAC_IN_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ) AS RATE FROM RWIPLOTSTS WHERE SCH_DUE_TIME <> ' ') CT, RWIPLOTSTS LT, MWIPMATDEF MM WHERE LT.LOT_ID = CT.LOT_ID AND LT.FACTORY = MM.FACTORY AND LT.FACTORY = CT.FACTORY AND LT.MAT_ID = MM.MAT_ID AND LT.MAT_ID = CT.MAT_ID AND LT.MAT_VER = MM.MAT_VER AND LT.MAT_VER = CT.MAT_VER ??

SELECT A.LOT_ID,A.MAT_ID,A.OLD_OPER,A.TRAN_CODE,A.TRAN_TIME,A.OLD_OPER_IN_TIME,A.QTY_1,A.LOT_CMF_1 AS LINE_YIELD, A.LOT_CMF_2 AS SECTION_YIELD, A.LOT_CMF_3 AS WORKCELL_YIELD, B.OPER_CMF_6 AS LINE ,B.OPER_CMF_7 AS SECTION,B.OPER_CMF_8 AS WORKCELL FROM RWIPLOTHIS A, MWIPOPRDEF B WHERE A.OLD_FACTORY = B.FACTORY AND A.HIST_DEL_FLAG=' ' AND A.OPER <> A.OLD_OPER AND A.OLD_OPER = B.OPER ??

SELECT C.OPER,C.LOT_ID,C.SUBLOT_ID,C.GRADE,C.LOSS_CODE FROM RWIPLOTHIS A, MWIPSLTLOS C WHERE A.OLD_FACTORY = C.FACTORY AND A.LOT_ID = C.LOT_ID AND A.OLD_OPER=C.OPER AND A.OPER <> A.OLD_OPER AND A.HIST_DEL_FLAG=' ' AND C.HIST_DEL_FLAG=' ' AND (C.GRADE='S' OR C.GRADE='F' OR C.GRADE='R') ??

SELECT LOT_ID, MAT_ID, TRAN_CODE, OLD_OPER, OPER, QTY_1, OLD_FAC_IN_TIME, OLD_OPER_IN_TIME, --START_TIME, TRAN_TIME, -- DECODE (START_TIME, -- ' ', ' ', -- TRIM(TO_CHAR((( TO_DATE (START_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') -- - TO_DATE (OLD_OPER_IN_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') -- ) -- ), '99990.0000')) -- ) AS QUEUE_TIME, -- DECODE (START_TIME, -- ' ', ' ', -- TRIM(TO_CHAR((( TO_DATE (TRAN_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') -- - TO_DATE (START_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') -- ) -- ), '99990.0000')) -- ) AS PROCESS_TIME, TRIM(TO_CHAR(( TO_DATE (TRAN_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') - TO_DATE (OLD_OPER_IN_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ) * 24, '99990.0000')) AS OPER_CYCLE_TIME, TRIM(TO_CHAR(( TO_DATE (TRAN_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') - TO_DATE (OLD_FAC_IN_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ) * 24, '99990.0000')) AS CUM_CYCLE_TIME FROM RWIPLOTHIS WHERE HIST_DEL_FLAG = ' ' AND OPER <> OLD_OPER ??
